LanguageData.SmartFarming.Icon.On.Desc: Sow the selected plant so long as it is currently the grow season.
LanguageData.SmartFarming.Icon.Smart.Desc: Sow plants so long as its predicted growth will reach the minimum harvest threshold before it is expected to die from cold or toxin.
LanguageData.SmartFarming.Icon.Force.Desc: Sow plants regardless of grow season status.
LanguageData.SmartFarming.Icon.HarvestNow.Desc: Designate all plants in this zone for harvesting, even if they're not fully grown yet.
LanguageData.SmartFarming.Icon.Priority.Desc: Pawns are encouraged to sow and harvest plants in order of priority.
LanguageData.SmartFarming.Icon.NoPettyJobs.Desc: Pawns will not sow new plants to this zone unless there is enough work to do, configured in the settings.
LanguageData.SmartFarming.Settings.ColdSowing.Desc: Normally, the game does not allow sowing when the ground is frozen, even if the type of plant being sown tolerates freezing temperatures. Disable this to maintain vanilla rules.
LanguageData.SmartFarming.Settings.UseAverageTemperat: Use average temperature prediction instead of low
When predicting the weather for the Smart Sow feature, use the average temperature for the day instead of the low. Using the average will extend the grow season at the risk of losing some crops.
LanguageData.SmartFarming.Settings.UseAverageFertilit: Use average zone fertility instead of weakest
When predicting plant growth, use the average zone fertility instead of the zone's weakest fertility.
LanguageData.SmartFarming.Settings.AutoCutBlighted: Automatically designate blighted crops for disposal
LanguageData.SmartFarming.Settings.AutoCutBlighted.De: If a crop becomes blighted, a cut work order will automatically be designated.
LanguageData.SmartFarming.Settings.AutoCutDying: Automatically try to harvest dying crops
LanguageData.SmartFarming.Settings.AutoCutDying.Desc: If a crop dies to the cold, try to automatically harvest any surviving crops before it's too late.
LanguageData.SmartFarming.Settings.ProcessedFood.Desc: When grow zones give an estimated potential nutrition yield, it multiplies the raw food's nutrition by this value. For example a Simple Meal multiplies the value by 1.8x.
LanguageData.SmartFarming.Settings.MinTempSlider: Minimum temperature allowance (Mod default: {0}, Min: {1}, Max: {2}):
LanguageData.SmartFarming.Settings.MinTemp: When predicting the weather of the earliest harvest day, consider anything below this temperature unacceptable. Plants can potentially die at 0C, but can usually survive if it's only barely freezing for a few hours. However, random daily temperatre deviation may reduce accuracy.
LanguageData.SmartFarming.Settings.PettyJobsSlider: Petty jobs margin (Mod default: {0}, Min: {1}, Max: {2}):
LanguageData.SmartFarming.Settings.PettyJobs: If "no petty jobs" is enabled on a zone, pawns will not sow a field unless there is at least this percentage of empty tiles to sow. This can be useful for animal grazing zones.
